original_text: Just as Jesus was coming up out of the water, he saw heaven being torn open and the Spirit descending on him like a dove.
korean_text: 곧 물에서 올라오실새 하늘이 갈라짐과 성령이 비둘기 같이 자기에게 내려오심을 보시더니

sentences.original_text: Just as Jesus was coming up out of the water
he saw heaven being torn open
and the Spirit descending on him like a dove
sentences.korean_translation: 성령이 비둘기처럼 자기에게 내려오는 것을 보았다
